The module must import .png file format: The module must import .ase file format
The module must import .ase file format
The module must import file or directory of files
The module must import file size from 1x1 up to 2048x2048
The module must allow the user to slice the file
The module must allow the user to delete empty slices
The module must allow the user to set a transparency color for the file
The module must allow the user to set a semi-transparency color for the file
The module must allow the user to use templates for autotiles
